column4: Is there a FREE Audio Spectrum Analyzer for Sound Card output, not only microphone or wav files  Even something that only measures the volume level by lighting up green.  Total Recorder has a feature but it's not free.

Is there a FREE Audio Spectrum Analyzer for Sound Card output, not only microphone or wav files  Even something that only measures the volume level by lighting up green.  Total Recorder has the feature but it's not free.  Audacity has the feature, but I don't want to use that.
stop that. You will NOT get help that way.
